abstract: The senior leadership of the Chinese government increasingly views the competition between the United States and China as a zero-sum game, with China the likely long-range winner if the American economy and domestic political system continue to stumble, according to Wang Jisi, an influential policy analyst who advises the Chinese Communist Party and the Foreign Ministry.

headline.main: Chinese Insider Offers Rare Glimpse of U.S.-China Frictions
